sn51.26:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
sn51.26:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta satta phala sattanisamsa patikankha.
sn51.26:2.3: no ce dittheva dhamme patikacca annam aradheti; atha maranakale annam aradheti,
sn51.26:2.4: no ce dittheva dhamme patikacca annam aradheti, no ce maranakale annam aradheti; atha pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya antaraparinibbayi hoti, upahaccaparinibbayi hoti, asankharaparinibbayi hoti, sasankharaparinibbayi hoti, uddhamsoto hoti akanitthagami.
sn51.26:2.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, catunnam iddhipadanam bhavitatta bahulikatatta ime satta phala sattanisamsa patikankha”ti.
